[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [IOperationSettings](./rush-lib.ioperationsettings.md) &gt; [allowCobuildWithoutCache](./rush-lib.ioperationsettings.allowcobuildwithoutcache.md)

## IOperationSettings.allowCobuildWithoutCache property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If true, this operation can use cobuilds for orchestration without restoring build cache entries.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowCobuildWithoutCache?: boolean;
```
